# 𒆹 BUGIN, BUNIN

𒆹 𒆸·𒀀 LAGAB x A #aya ⇔ Weiher

𒆹 suk ≈ 𒉻 sukkulent 𓇓 @ 𓆷

𒆹 sug "reed-bed, marsh" suk™ 𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓇏 𓈅 | marshland, field, country |

𒆹 sug ⇔ sedges 𓇓 𒃻 šá #şuşû 𓋴 𓇐 𓏮 𓆰 swamp 𓆷

𒆹 •sud 𒄑𒅖𒉈 ĝeš-iš-de₃ 𒄑𒀸𒋼 •ša.te "seat" 𒆹 seat, shrine, chapel, chair, throne, dwelling

𒆹 a unit of area
